title: netsuite中Mutiple Select的赋值问题的解决-CarlZeng
content:
var fittingsitem = nlapiGetFieldValue(‘custrecord_fittingsitem’);//var SelectedValues=fittingsitem.split(‘’);然后在record.setFieldValue(‘custitem_fittingsitem’, SelectedValues );ok就

var fittingsitem = nlapiGetFieldValue(‘custrecord_fittingsitem’);//

var SelectedValues=fittingsitem.split(‘’);

然后在

record.setFieldValue(‘custitem_fittingsitem’, SelectedValues );

ok就
more:
var fittingsitem = nlapiGetFieldValue(‘custrecord_fittingsitem’);//var SelectedValues=fittingsitem.split(‘’);然后在record.setFieldValue(‘custitem_fittingsitem’, SelectedValues );ok就

var fittingsitem = nlapiGetFieldValue(‘custrecord_fittingsitem’);//

var SelectedValues=fittingsitem.split(‘’);

然后在

record.setFieldValue(‘custitem_fittingsitem’, SelectedValues );

ok就
